name: @ffk/api
description: Fleet of the Faithful Knights API

scripts.docker-build: docker build -t gcr.io/the-sandbox-311907/api:$(git rev-parse --verify HEAD) -t gcr.io/the-sandbox-311907/api:latest -f Dockerfile .
scripts.docker-run: docker run -i --net='host' -e FFK_DATABASE_SERVER=$FFK_DATABASE_SERVER -e FFK_DATABASE_PORT=$FFK_DATABASE_PORT -e FFK_DATABASE_NAME=$FFK_DATABASE_NAME -e FFK_DATABASE_USERNAME=$FFK_DATABASE_USERNAME -e FFK_DATABASE_PASSWORD=$FFK_DATABASE_PASSWORD gcr.io/the-sandbox-311907/api:$(git rev-parse --verify HEAD)
scripts.docker-publish: docker push gcr.io/the-sandbox-311907/api:$(git rev-parse --verify HEAD) && docker push gcr.io/the-sandbox-311907/api:latest

author: Keanu Ashwell
